channel.title: KRNX - The Relationship Marketing Podcast
channel.description: ReferralNetworX.com's relationship marketing podcast. Learn how to generate referrals for your business and find out why building genuine business relationships is the wave of the future.
channel.itunes:author: Alex Ford, Walt Ford
channel.itunes:subtitle: It's all about relationships!
channel.itunes:summary: ReferralNetworX.com's relationship marketing podcast. Learn how to generate referrals for your business and find out why building genuine business relationships is the wave of the future.
channel.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasting, podcaster, business, referral, referrals, referral marketing, relationship, relationship marketing, networking, marketing, referral network, referral networx, networx, relationship building, relationship builder, future business
